name: rahul xd v3
description: rahul xd v3 by rahul tech

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: make it true if you want joel md  bot to view status.

MODE.description: make it public or private bot

AUTO_TYIPNG.description: make it true to enable auto voice

AUTO_STICKER.description: make it true to enable auto sticker or false to do not

STATUS_REPLY.description: inter a message that will reply a status

FAKE_RECORDING.description: make it true  to change your wapresence into recording...

ANTI_LINK.description: make it true  to auto delete links in groups

AUTO_REACT_STATUS.description: you can use this public joel md url if you have your personal key So you can use him.
